tool_description: Get streaming links for MOVIES & TV SHOWS using REAL-DEBRID account
name: Orion
title: Orion

api_list.name: Fetch Tv Shows Links (Torrents)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://orion1.p.rapidapi.com/api/links/show"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "orion1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
